org_name: AppleTree Early Learning Center PCS Southwest (Amidon)

exhibit.description: AppleTree Early Learning Public Charter School's mission is to provide young children with the social, emotional, and cognitive foundations that will enable them to succeed in school. AppleTree implements a research-based instructional program that supports the development of young children's language, literacy, and behavioral skills as well as their understanding of the world around them. The school uses a comprehensive, integrated curriculum designed to engage young children in playful activities and to build on their natural eagerness to learn.
